description:
Integrate the MercadoPago plugin and start charging from your website.

Actions included:
- Create Payment Preference to collect (returns URL to collect).
- Bring payment preference.
- Search payment preference



# Create your Access Token Mercadopago

Enter this link to generate it: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar/developers/panel/credentials

Configure it from "Plugins", where it says "Authorization" write it with this format.

Bearer [access-token]
Ex, "Bearer TEST-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXXXXXXXX-XXXXXX"


#### 3. Create the URL to charge from the worflow in "Add and action"> Plugins> Mercadopago - Create payment preferences.

Use the "init_url" variable that it returns.
